page.title: 14LADHOPE CEMETERY
page.content: THIS CEMETERY IS SITUATED ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE LADHOPE BURN FROM THE GOLF COURSE. IT IS ONE OF TWO CEMETERIES CURRENTLY IN USE.AN INCREASING NUMBER OF FUNERALS NOW TAKE PLACE AT THE CREMATORIUM IN EDINBURGH SO THAT INTERMENTS ARE DECREASING. RECENT STATISTICS SUGGEST THAT THE RATIO IS 50:50.THE GROUNDS ARE MAINTAINED TO A VERY HIGH STANDARD BY THE PARKS DEPARTMENT OF THE ETTRICK AND LAUDERDALE DISTRICT COUNCIL AND AT THE PRESENT TIME AN EXTENSION IS BEING MADE TO THE CAR PARK AREA OUTSIDE THE MAIN ENTRANCE.
